transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, hello.
Customer: Haan, yeh kya tarika hua aap hold pe kisi aur ka phone leke hume intzaar karwa rahe. Sir call nahi toh hum intzaar karwa rahe, theek hai do minute, do minute toh wait kar sakta hu mai. Nahi kiya aapne. Aap itna hamper mat hoiye, itna hyper mat hoiye sir pehli baat toh. Nahi aise aise thodi hoga aap kisi aur ka call leke mai hold pe rakhe. Maine aap aapne aapne bhi rakha tha na sir. Maine kisi aur se baat karni hai na, free ho tab mere se baat kar lijiyega. Maine aapko call back kiya na, maine aapko bola tha ek minute sir, ek minute se zyada mai aapko hold rakhti toh aapka. Ek minute me nahi hua na toh hamare paas me aur bhi kaam rehte. Sir buyer se bhi aap aisi baat karte hai kya? Sir buyer se bhi aisi baat karte ho? Aur jis buylead ki aap baat kar rahe ho na kal ki date me aapne kiya. Kyunki aap logo ne pareshan kar diya hai. Jo complaint likhate hai woh complaint aap aap issue ko solve karte nahi ho aur kisi aur field me ho jaate ho phir.
Executive: Sir pehle toh suniye. Nahi nahi suniye aapke paas pata nahi kya kya kya kya batate rehte ho. Kal aapne kitni lead use ki aap keh rahe ho mujhe lead nahi mil pa rahi. Kal aapne kitni lead use ki hai bataiye.
Customer: Suniye, suniye meri baat aaram se suniye.
Executive: Mai aapki sun hi rahi thi itni der se sir, iske baad mai aapse puch rahi hu aapne kal kitni lead use ki aap mujhe yeh nahi dene de rahe na. Aap toh andar se chale jaate rehte ho toh uska wait thodi karenge hum. Aapka kaam hai aap karte raho, mujhe kya dene de rahe ho.
Customer: Haan theek hai sir.
Executive: Aapko agar piche se chaar baar call aa jayega toh ek baar aap unhe phone utha ke bologe na mai call back kar raha hu. Nahi ek second aapne call kiya hai, aapne call kiya hai toh free hoke mujhe call kiya na ya busy hoke?
Customer: Are sir.
Executive: Aisa nahi hota sir aur aap ek baat batao, chalo aap apna batao. Ab maine call back kiya na aapko woh baat bata dijiye kal kitni lead use kiya aapne. Aaram se, aaram se, aaram se sir aaram se, aaram se, aaram se. Aaram se baat kar rahi hu sir mai aapse, aaram se hi baat kar rahi hu. Nahi aaram se nahi kar rahe aap, aap bilkul aaram se ekdum chilled hoke. Suniye.
Customer: Matlab kal Numaan ne WhatsApp pe mujhe buylead bheji ki sir inko turant karo aap baat, inse turant karo aap. Aise karke jo fake thi, un-fake thi woh saaro se baat karwa di, kisi ne uthaya nahi. Kisi ne uthaya toh woh bola ki mujhe mai toh search kar raha tha sirf aur kisne diya aapko number mera? Aur ek ka switch off aa raha tha. Aise karke unhone Numaan sir ne jo hai woh buylead kharch karwa di. Ab uske baad me dashboard jo hai woh bilkul white nazar aa raha hai, theek hai. Ab mujhe yeh bataiye aaj takreeban open hue hue apne ko isko account ko jo hai ek month ho gaya hai ya shayad isse upar ho gaya hai. Payment diye hue toh do month ho rahe hai hone wale hai aur jo live hai na woh live hue hue takreeban ek mahina ya sawa mahina ho raha hai. Mujhe marble masjid member ke liye maine yeh package liya hai, marble wazu bhetak ke liye maine package liya hai. Marble stone garden wash basin ke liye maine package liya hai, theek hai. Stone pedestal wash basin ke liye maine package liya hai, stone counter basin ke liye maine package liya hai. Yeh sirf aur sirf paanch product pe hum kaam kar rahe hai, hamari company manufacturing kar rahi hai. Uske liye humne package liya hai, anyatha aap fazool jo hai kisi aur matlab cheez ki aap denge toh woh bataiye hamare kis kaam ki, kaam ki hai kya aap batao?
Executive: Hello. Sir kal jo aapne saari lead use ki hai na. Suno. Woh yeh stone wash basin ki ki hai aur. Chalo kal aapko Numaan ne lead bheji, parso ko bhi aapne aath se nau lead use ki hai, parso toh aapko nahi bheji thi na Numaan ne. Usme bhi usme bhi maine Numaan ko complaint likhwai hai. Usko koi maine certificate nahi diya hai ki bahut bada tune teer maar ke mere ko jo hai lead bhej di, bahut bada kaam kar diya. Uska bhi maine complaint dala hai ki bhai mere fake aa rahi hai yeh. Yeh jo aap de rahe hai na yeh fake chal rahi hai. Kuch aisi do ki jisse humne jo aapko payment diya hai woh payment bhi hamara nikle, hamara business bhi chale. Sir payment jo diya hai na bilkul sahi aapko Numaan ne bola tha ki jo payment aapne diya na ek saal ka diya hai. Ek mahina toh service live hone me lag jaata hai aapki baat bhi theek hai, theek hai ek mahina abhi nahi hua hai meri baat toh, ek mahina nahi hua hai. Ek mahine se aaj ke haath uth ke baithe hue hai hum. Nahi aapke haath uth ke bilkul nahi baithna hai aapko lead bhejte hai sir dekho aap aisa karo agar mai aapko call kar rahi hu aap phone nahi uthaoge toh mai aapko message dalungi. Toh kal kya aapne aisa kiya kitne customero ne aapka phone nahi uthaya? Aapko aapne unko message dala hai sir?
Customer: Kisne?
Executive: Aur kal saari aapne aap keh rahe hai na customero ne phone nahi uthaya. Kisne? Kisko? Haan. Buyer ko. Jiske inquiry thi. Haan. Aap jo hai na is mahine me aapko batau, suno sir jab aapka package live nahi hua tha na tab aapka package. Ek minute baat are aage mat niklo pehle piche aao jo baat kya bol rahe ho aap. Meri baat sun lo pehle. Kya bol rahe ho kisko message karna tha? Ek minute buyer ko. Kaunse buyer ko?
Customer: Jo aapne lead purchase ki hai. Haan, kisliye? Jab woh deny kar rahe hai woh mana hi kar rahe hai, woh agree nahi kar rahe hai requirement se agree nahi kar rahe hai. Mai uski baat kar rahi hu jisne phone nahi uthaya. Jisne phone nahi uthaya na uski baat kar rahi hu sabne deny kar diya. Switch off aa raha hai switch off aa raha hai switch off. Switch off aa raha tha buyer ka. Sir aapke paas zyada time hai kya sir batao pehle toh? Aapke paas zyada time hai. Kyunki abhi bhi na lead available hai, nahi abhi bhi lead available hai. Aap keh rahe ho dashboard khali pada hai jab tak aap khud search nahi karoge. Dekho meri baat suno, suno meri baat. Itni itni fast bologe toh mere kuch samajh me nahi aayega bhes ke aage been bajana hai. Aaram se tasalli se baat karo taki mai aapki baat ko sun saku, aapki baat ko samajh saku. Ab mujhe yeh bataiye aap dashboard pe aayenge?
Executive: Mai dashboard, sir dashboard nahi pehle toh aap buylead pe jao, dashboard chhod do aap. Toh wohi toh dashboard kisko bolte hai phir usi ko toh bolte honge. Dashboard mobile app me bhi alag se dashboard aata hai, aath minute pehle marble wash basin ki lead aayi aapko nahi dikh rahi, 22 minute pehle pedestal wash basin ki lead aayi aapko nahi dikh rahi. Aaram se, aaram se aise aise mai samajh nahi paungi aap kya bol rahe ho mujhe. Aaram se karke baat karo aap. Sir aap buylead pe click karo, aap buylead pe click karo. Haan haan aise aise karke bolo aap.

Haan ek minute. Yeh dekho yeh. Hello. Hello. Awaaz aa rahi hai meri? Hello.
Executive: Sir aapne search kiya? Ek suniye meri baat. Aap dashboard pe aaiye jaha buylead hai, first buylead hai. Theek hai maine usko. Sir waha mat aap buy aap dashboard pe nahi aap buylead pe click karo waha recent lead likha hua hai. Aap buylead pe haan wohi pe bol raha hu mai, dashboard kisko bolte hai. Haan theek hai. Dashboard alag hota hai, buylead alag hota hai, lead manager alag hota hai sir sab kuch alag alag hai. Dashboard kisko bolte, dashboard kisko bolte? Dashboard woh hai jaha pe aapko messages bhi dikhte hai, aapko buylead bhi dikhti hai jo aapke catalog product hai woh bhi dikhte hai. Jaha pe jaha pe inquiry dikhi woh toh lead manager hai. Sir mai aath saal se IndiaMART me hu, mujhe pata hai kya hota hai kya nahi hota. Aap mobile app pe online hona. Aap sirf aap sirf employee hai aur humne aath saalo se package kharida hai. Tabhi toh sir aapko nahi pata sab kuch, aath saal se humne package liya toh aapko pata hona chahiye hume aath se business milta hai nahi. Are sir. Suniye abhi abhi first buylead dikhai de rahi hai aapko? Rohit Lawanto. Haan mujhe dikh rahi hai. Theek hai woh hamara product hai kya humne lagaya hai kya batao? Marble wash basin me nahi deal karte aap? Nahi nahi nahi. Kaunsi lead dikhi hai batao. Buyer ne clear likha hai na Rohit Lawanto. Isme dekho Rohit Lawanto likha hua hai first Rohit Lawanto. Start me dekho. Sir hume screen dikhao, sir aap screen dikhao, screen dikhao mujhe, mujhe toh nahi dikh rahi aapko. Suno suno WhatsApp pe aai likho mujhe, mai screen shot leke dikhta hu de deta hu mai. Mai aapko video meeting pe ek link bhej rahi hu aap mujhe waha dikha dijiye, WhatsApp pe mai screen shot nahi bhej paungi sir aapki screen bhi nahi bhej paungi. Mobile pe mobile pe hu. Haan toh mobile se screen share kar sakte ho, aap mobile se bhi sir mujhe screen share kar sakte ho. Mai link bhej rahi hu aapki email id pe. Aapko isko mai screen shot de deta hu ya mai karke dikha deta hu aapko. Sir Numaan ko bhi aap screen shot hi bhejte ho ki video meeting pe aate ho online? Nahi video meeting me nahi aate hum. Kyu? Kyu kya? Nahi aate. Toh sir kaise dikhega aapko? Aap mujhe screen kaise dikhaoge? Sir mai sun ke bol raha hu aapko Rohit Lawanto, pedestal wash basin, counter top wash basin, first buylead hai jo ki pehle pe likhi aayi hai. Maine isko purchase nahi ki hai kyunki isme yeh Rohit Lawanto ki chahiye isko buyer ko. Hamara jo product hai woh hai stone wash basin, stone pedestal wash basin. Stone counter top wash basin. Hamara toh yeh product hai na. Abhi mai abhi aapke kehne se purchase bhi kar lunga suniye meri baat. Yeh direct buyer mana karega. Theek hai. Woh bolega Rohit Lawanto ki chahiye aur aap kya bologe ki sir aapne buylead purchase kar li. Ab kaise matlab kaise baithega yeh mamla? Mai agar purchase karta hu toh dikhta nahi. Numaan ko Numaan acha Numaan ko screen shot bhejo aap, Numaan ko screen shot bhejo kaunsi lead available hai. Numaan ka number toh hai na aapke paas. Numaan idhar aao phone apne aapko lagaiye. Haan Numaan ke phone pe bhejo. Haan ek minute. Numaan yeh jo abhi lead available hai sir ko bhejo yeh jo. Yeh 10 minute pehle sir Numaan ne aapko 10 minute pehle lead bheji hai aapne woh dekhi hai? Woh screen pe dikh rahi hai aapko nahi dikh rahi? Kaunsi kaunsi 10 minute pehle bheji hai? Aapko abhi message bheja hoga na morning me Numaan ne jo lead aayi thi woh dikhi nahi aapko? Ek minute ruko. Numaan 10 minute se. 10 minute se toh aapke saath me baat kar raha hu. Haan toh haan 10 minute se mere se baat chal rahi hai lekin hamari team kaam karti rehti hai sir. Ab dikhao usme. Haan. Ab mujhse phone pe baat kar rahe ho na toh net aapka off hoga sir. Aise hi jab buyer ka aapke paas call aata hoga us samay mobile aapka nahi chalta hoga. Pehli baat toh sir dekho aapko jitni lead mil rahi hai na utni kisi ko nahi mil rahi hai. Kyunki aapki service abhi abhi activate hui hai. Jo client just start me service leta hai na. Sir aap khud ek kaam karo aap na lead dekh lo jab aapka MDC chal raha tha na aap 50 lead lete the aapne ki. Abhi aap abhi is mahine me aap aap sirf yeh cheez kya safe record hai kya? Jo business ka kaam hai aap mera sun hi nahi rahe ho. Mai bol raha hu jo humne product diye hai uske liye humne yeh package liya hai. Marble. Sir Numaan ne lead bheji hai na sir Numaan ne. Numaan ne diya hai na. Haan toh Numaan ne diya hai na sir aapko. Kab? Kab diya hai? Aap dekho aaj bheja nahi hai subah? Ek minute wohi toh dekh raha hu mai ek minute aap aap samajh nahi. Haan dekhiye. Haan ruko. Ek minute. Hello haji sir good morning. Hello. Hello. Haanji sir. Maine kitni jo hai buylead delete kar di hai. Unki mai aapko apne number se phone kar raha hu. Ek minute me mai aapko apne number se phone kar raha hu. Ek minute. Ek minute me karna hai toh kijiyega mai aapke liye free nahi baitha hu. Nahi mere andar itni ability nahi hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complains about being put on hold.

- Customer received fake buyleads, wasting time and money.

- Dashboard appears blank.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with the leads received.



Resolution:

- Executive explains the one-year payment plan.

- Executive clarifies the difference between dashboard, buylead.

- Executive asks the customer to check the buylead section.

- Executive offers assistance via video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send a screenshot to Numaan.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, dashboard, complaints, subscription
